StateBubbleSortLastElementsSorted:
Mark %s and %s as sorted
	Array is sorted!
StateInsertionSortCompare:
Compare with prev value
	swap if %s > %s
StateInsertionSortPrevLower:
Elements are in order
Mark both as sorted
StateMergeSortMarkParts:
Recursively select
parts to be merged
StateMergeSortCopyBack:
Copy sorted elements back
to the original array
StateQuickSortAllElementsLowerThanPivot:
All values lower than pivot
   Mark pivot as sorted
StateQuickSortMarkLastElementSorted:
Mark last element in
the subarray as sorted
StateQuickSortSelectPivotBegin:
Select last partition
   element as pivot
StateRadixSortCopyValues:
Copy all values to temp
array in sorted order
StateRadixSortCopyValuesBack:
Copy sorted values back
to the original array
StateRadixSortDecrementCount:
Decrement bucket value
	to get index
StateRadixSortSelectBuckets:
Select adjacent buckets
  and add their values
StateRadixSortSelectOutgoing:
Select outgoing array
position with index: %s
StateRadixSortSumCount:
Sum equals to: %s
Set sum in second bucket
StateSelectionSortCompare:
Compare with lowest element
	Check if %s < %s
StateSelectionSortNoNeedSwap:
Swapping is unnecessary
Marked element is the lowest
StateSelectionSortMarkLastAsSorted:
Mark last element as sorted
	  Array is sorted!
StateSelectionSortSelectFirstElement:
Mark first unsorted
element as lowest
StateSelectionSortSwapLowestWithUnsorted:
Swap lowest element with
 first unsorted element
